mapper.select: SELECT /* Board.boardList */ board.BRD_ID , board.BRD_NM , board.BRD_DESC , board.BRD_ADM_USR , board.BRD_CRT_AUTH , board.BRD_VIEW_AUTH , board.POST_FILE_YN , board.POST_CMNT_YN , board.POST_CMNT_FILE_YN , board.POST_POPUP_YN , board.POST_SECRET_YN , board.POST_FIX_YN , board.DEL_YN , board.CRT_DT_TM , board.CRT_USR_ID , board.MOD_DT_TM , board.MOD_USR_ID FROM PORTAL.PT_BOARD board WHERE 1=1 AND board.BRD_ID = #{BRD_ID} AND board.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY board.CRT_DT_TM DESC

WITH /* Board.BoardPostList */ POST_LIST AS ( SELECT ROWNUM AS POST_ID_ROWNUM , T.* FROM ( SELECT post.POST_ID , post.BRD_ID , post.POPUP_YN , post.POST_TITLE , post.POST_CONTENT , post.CRT_DT_TM , post.CRT_USR_ID , post.CRT_USR_ID AS CRT_USR_NM , post.DEL_YN FROM PORTAL.PT_BOARD_POST post WHERE 1=1 AND post.BRD_ID = #{BRD_ID} ORDER BY post.POST_ID ASC ) T ) , ROW_POST_LIST AS ( SELECT post.* , (SELECT COUNT(USR_ACTN) FROM PORTAL.PT_PORTAL_LOG WHERE USR_ACTN ='DETAIL' AND SCRN_DET_ID = post.POST_ID) AS POST_VIEW_COUNT , (SELECT COUNT(post_file.FILE_ID) FROM PORTAL.PT_BOARD_POST_FILE post_file WHERE post_file.DEL_YN = 'N' AND post.POST_ID = post_file.POST_ID) AS POST_FILE_COUNT FROM POST_LIST post WHERE 1=1 AND post.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND UPPER(post.POST_TITLE) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{searchVal}||'%')
AND UPPER(post.CRT_USR_ID) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{searchVal}||'%')
) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT
COUNT(ORDER_T.POST_ID) AS COUNT
ROWNUM rn , ORDER_T.*
FROM ( SELECT * FROM ROW_POST_LIST ORDER BY
ROW_POST_LIST.POST_ID_ROWNUM
ROW_POST_LIST.POST_TITLE
ROW_POST_LIST.CRT_DT_TM
ROW_POST_LIST.CRT_USR_NM
ROW_POST_LIST.POST_VIEW_COUNT
ROW_POST_LIST.POST_ID
ASC
DESC
DESC
) ORDER_T ) T WHERE 1=1
AND rn BETWEEN #{listViewCount} * (((#{start} + #{length}) / #{listViewCount}) - 1) + 1 AND #{listViewCount} * ((#{start} + #{length}) / #{listViewCount})

SELECT /* Board.boardPostPopupList */ post.POST_ID , post.BRD_ID FROM PORTAL.PT_BOARD_POST post INNER JOIN PORTAL.PT_BOARD board ON (post.BRD_ID = board.BRD_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND SYSDATE BETWEEN post.POPUP_START_DT_TM AND post.POPUP_END_DT_TM AND post.POPUP_YN = 'Y' AND post.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT /* Board.boardPostDetail */ post.POST_ID , post.BRD_ID , post.POST_TITLE , post.POST_CONTENT , post.POST_VIEW_AUTH , post.POPUP_YN , post.POPUP_START_DT_TM , post.POPUP_END_DT_TM , post.SECRET_YN , post.FIX_YN , post.CRT_DT_TM , post.CRT_USR_ID , post.MOD_DT_TM , post.MOD_USR_ID , board.BRD_NM , board.BRD_DESC , board.BRD_ADM_USR , board.BRD_CRT_AUTH , board.BRD_VIEW_AUTH , board.POST_FILE_YN , board.POST_CMNT_YN , board.POST_CMNT_FILE_YN , board.POST_POPUP_YN , board.POST_SECRET_YN , board.POST_FIX_YN , (SELECT COUNT(USR_ACTN) FROM PORTAL.PT_PORTAL_LOG WHERE USR_ACTN ='DETAIL' AND SCRN_DET_ID = post.POST_ID) AS POST_VIEW_COUNT FROM PORTAL.PT_BOARD_POST post INNER JOIN PORTAL.PT_BOARD board ON (post.BRD_ID = board.BRD_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND post.DEL_YN = 'N' AND post.POST_ID = #{POST_ID} AND post.BRD_ID = #{BRD_ID}

WITH /* Board.boardPostBeforeNext */ POST_BEFORE AS ( SELECT * FROM( SELECT 'BEFORE' AS POST_LOCATION , post.BRD_ID , post.POST_ID , post.POST_TITLE FROM PORTAL.PT_BOARD_POST post WHERE 1=1 AND post.DEL_YN = 'N' AND post.POST_ID < #{POST_ID} AND post.BRD_ID = #{BRD_ID} ORDER BY post.POST_ID DESC ) WHERE 1=1 AND ROWNUM = 1 ) , POST_NEXT AS ( SELECT * FROM( SELECT 'NEXT' AS POST_LOCATION , post.BRD_ID , post.POST_ID , post.POST_TITLE FROM PORTAL.PT_BOARD_POST post WHERE 1=1 AND post.DEL_YN = 'N' AND post.POST_ID > #{POST_ID} AND post.BRD_ID = #{BRD_ID} ORDER BY post.POST_ID ASC ) WHERE 1=1 AND ROWNUM = 1 ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM POST_BEFORE UNION ALL SELECT * FROM POST_NEXT )

SELECT /* Board.boardPostFileList */ post_file.FILE_ID , post_file.POST_ID , post_file.FILE_TYPE , post_file.PARENT_CMNT_ID , post_file.SRV_FILE_PATH , post_file.SRV_FILE_NM , post_file.ORG_FILE_NM , post_file.FILE_EXT , post_file.FILE_SIZE , post_file.DEL_YN , post_file.CRT_DT_TM , post_file.CRT_USR_ID , post_file.MOD_DT_TM , post_file.MOD_USR_ID FROM PORTAL.PT_BOARD_POST_FILE post_file WHERE 1=1 AND post_file.DEL_YN = 'N' AND post_file.POST_ID = #{POST_ID} ORDER BY post_file.FILE_ID

SELECT /* Board.boardPostFileSelect */ FILE_ID , POST_ID , FILE_TYPE , PARENT_CMNT_ID , SRV_FILE_PATH , SRV_FILE_NM , ORG_FILE_NM , FILE_EXT , FILE_SIZE , DEL_YN , CRT_DT_TM , CRT_USR_ID , MOD_DT_TM , MOD_USR_ID FROM PORTAL.PT_BOARD_POST_FILE WHERE 1=1 AND FILE_ID = #{FILE_ID} AND POST_ID = #{POST_ID} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
